profile.headline: ﻪאﻖ†ҒгΞλҜ
profile.summary:
Hai.

Sorry, but I can't accept all friend invites (even though I'd like to), due to Steam's 250 friend limit. I like to keep a few spots on my friends list free, as well, so I can add people. However, you can join my group, and communicate with me there (as well as join my games ^^).

Of course, I reserve the right to remove any friend at any time without warning. It usually happens to people on my friends list who I don't recognize. People I don't recognize include people who don't talk to me, play in my games, etc. I do recognize people who say "CAN I PLAY WITH YOU?!?!!", but it's not a good recognition, and they may be removed if they annoy me. If you are removed, you can try readding me, but I make no promises.

Too many people asking me "how are you?", "What's up?", or "Join meh game pl0x" gets tiresome. Do not ever sum tires, because it gets into complex-plastic maths.

If I'm playing, then you may try joining me (whoever you may be!). Most of the time, I let whoever wants to play with me play with me. You join first, you play first; that way I don't have to choose some friends over others, or friends over fans. Now, there is the occasional game where 3 people ask me to play L4D2 campaign (for example), and so if one of them crashes or is loading, I will ask anyone in their spot to leave, since it was a planned game.

Cleverbot: I think you are a robot.
User: What would you do to a robot? Does it start with k?
Cleverbot: No, it starts with a d.
User: And ends with ry?
Cleverbot: A.
User: DA?
Cleverbot: Yes.
User: What's the middle letters?
Cleverbot: Cream.
User: Dcreama?
Cleverbot: Are you still worried?!

group.headline: L4D!
group.summary: Left 4 Dead is a co-op action horror game that casts up to four players in an epic struggle for survival against swarming zombie hordes and terrifying mutant monsters. Created by Valve, creators of Counter-Strike, Team Fortress, and Half-Life.

group.headline: TF2 in a nutshell
group.summary: Team Fortress® 2 (TF2) is the sequel to the game that put class-based, multiplayer team warfare on the map. Play as the flame-throwing Pyro, the room clearing Heavy, or the Spy, a master of disguises. Other classes include: Scout, Sniper, Medic, Engineer, Demoman, or Soldier.

group.headline: TorontoWTF.com
group.summary:
Hello, Bonjour! and Welcome, Bienvenue!

TorontoWTF.com is a community of players from all over the world who enjoy a mix of fun, fair and competitive gaming without the BS!!! We have probably the most exciting collection of various game servers you'll ever play on while offering a relaxed environment for players of all skill levels and experience! Be sure to stop by out website at www.torontowtf.com and say hello on the forums or join us in Ventrilo! If you would like to join the WTF Army, applying for staff or admin visit the website. Takeitez!

We are always interested in working and playing with other Communites for the overall good gaming experience and lol's! Feel free to visit our website or Vent anytime to Scrim or organize anything fun and interesting...

group.headline: L4D2
group.summary:
Set in the zombie apocalypse, Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2) is the highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning Left 4 Dead, the #1 co-op game of 2008.

This co-operative action horror FPS takes you and your friends through the cities, swamps and cemeteries of the Deep South, from Savannah to New Orleans across five expansive campaigns.
No information given.

Please, pay attention to the creators of the announcements; I make maybe 1 announcement a month, on average. Lots of announcments are created too, so consider yourself warned ;)


To the admins: If the announcement doesn't affect more than 90% of the group members, it's probably best if you don't post it.

The most-anticipated game of the year and the sequel to the best-selling first-person action game of all time, Modern Warfare 2 continues the gripping and heart-racing action as players face off against a new threat dedicated to bringing the world to the brink of collapse.

group.headline: READ BELOW FOR HOW TO PLAY INSTRUCTIONS
group.summary:
ﮒkצ Gaming Organization presents a unique perspective on the games that we play.
Mr.Zero and ﮒkצ decided it was time the community decided how a game was played.
As a result, we write our own private, in-house plugins, which we continually develop and improve, and are influenced by the community members ideas, posted on our forum!

We're always interested in meeting new players, and hearing your ideas of what you'd like to see in future updates.

So why not join? Become a part of the ﮒkצ Gaming Organization. See what our community---and our servers have to offer to your gaming experience!



LOVE OUR SERVERS? JOIN OUR STEAMGROUP & PLAY ANYTIME!


Our servers are HYBRID servers.

What is a hybrid server?
A Hybrid server is a server that runs multiple gametypes. Our servers run the following gametypes in a rotation.
Versus -> Survival Versus -> Scavenge , and then the pattern repeats.

We strive to give our players the most flexibility possible in the game, as a result, we have players vote for the next campaign/survival/scavenge map.



Having a player issue?
Please REPORT the issue with as much detail as possible on our forum, link below.



========== ADMINS ==========

Athena
Blue
Bolt_Man
Con Artist
Dragoonsfear
Engrish Wage
I Hart Num Nums
Kaweru
Nort
Skaank
Slightly
Telos

OUR SERVERS RUN HLX COMMUNITY EDITION! All servers are connected to the same rankings!
http://skygaming.hlxce.org/

OUR SERVERS ARE PART OF THE SOURCEBANS COMMUNITY - Our servers are linked, if a player is banned on one server, they're banned on all of our servers.
http://sky-gaming.org/bans/


======== DONATION BENEFITS =======

1. Reserve Slot (Server Full? No Problem!)
2. Ping Protection (No ping kicks!)
3. Kick Protection (No more idle kicks! Sends you to spectator!)


========== OUR SERVERS ==========

LEFT 4 DEAD 2 Servers

68.232.168.236:27015 sky-gaming.org << 20vs << hardcore
208.167.224.166:27015 sky-gaming.org << 20vs << increment




Our community is funded by the generous contributions that our members, well, contribute, each month. We're non-profit, all contributions go towards the funding of current and future server costs.

We also have prize give-aways each month, courtesy of our community manager, Athena.
Check the announcements below, and the forum, for current and past tournaments, and competitions!



Want to contribute to Sky Gaming Organization?
--------- PAYPAL : donate@sky-gaming.org


We also offer competitive contribution options, as well as the above listed benefits.
5usd - 1 month , 25usd - 6 months (1 free!) , 45usd - 12 months (3 free!)




Have an idea you'd like to see implemented? Please tell us! Your feedback is what has evolved our System to what it is today!


DON'T FORGET TO INVITE YOUR FRIENDS TO THE GROUP!

group.groupName: Spierfan's Group of awesome friends and people!

group.headline: It's exclusive!
group.summary:
Yeah, we use fancy words too. I got no idea why I made ths group; maybe just because I like the idea of a private group. It's sort of like a blog group for all my friends and their friends and their friends... :P

Invite your friends! Members can create new members, and admins can create new admins. So choose both carefully.




About making announcements:
1) Use proper grammar and English. If you don't care enough to make it look good, don't post it.
2) Don't create too many announcements, or you may be considered to be spamming, and therefore kicked.
3) Don't use profanity in announcements. If you feel that you have to, you should wait anyway until you've cooled off (and become less angry). If swearing is engrained in your speech habits, you may want to try to break yourself off from it.
4) Admins may kick spammers. I trust them and their best judgement. Admin ability to choose new admins is now no longer available.
5) Don't make announcements horribly pointless like "Hi, I'm _____", or something that can easily be done in chat or the comments section.
6) No messing with other players announcements. They created it, it's theirs to manage.
